name: Dungeon Party Healer (prototype)
description:
Dungeon Party Healer is a game about being the healer in a party of heroes while going on quests to defeat various creatures and monsters.

This prototype is the basics of the gameplay during combat.

HOW TO PLAY:

- The white circle represents the cooldown of the monster's and heroes attack.

- You can click on the spells at the left side of the screen to use them and heal the heroes.

- The game doesn't end, you can just defeat the monster and then close the game.
